trans-unit.source: ‘Headless’ operation on a Raspberry Pi, BeagleBone, or any number of other Linux-based single-board computers.
trans-unit.target: ‘Headless’ operation on a Raspberry Pi, BeagleBone, or any number of other Linux-based single-board computers.

trans-unit.source: Configuration: TBD. Reading and writing of the configuration file(s). Requires a restart of FLdigi.
trans-unit.target: Configuration: TBD. Reading and writing of the configuration file(s). Requires a restart of FLdigi.

trans-unit.source: Logging: Get and set various log field contents. This is in the context of ham contact logs, not debug logs.
trans-unit.target: Logging: Get and set various log field contents. This is in the context of ham contact logs, not debug logs.

trans-unit.source: Modem: Get and set the modem type, carrier frequency, bandwidth, etc.
trans-unit.target: Modem: Get and set the modem type, carrier frequency, bandwidth, etc.

trans-unit.source: Modem: Get and set various modem configuration options for Olivia, WEFAX, and NAVTEX
trans-unit.target: Modem: Get and set various modem configuration options for Olivia, WEFAX, and NAVTEX

trans-unit.source: Rig control: Get or set various rig controls, such as frequency, mode, etc.
trans-unit.target: Rig control: Get or set various rig controls, such as frequency, mode, etc.

trans-unit.source: Squelch: Get or set the squelch
trans-unit.target: Squelch: Get or set the squelch

trans-unit.source: Terminate the Program: Terminate the program gracefully by asking it to close.
trans-unit.target: Terminate the Program: Terminate the program gracefully by asking it to close.

trans-unit.source: Text: Get text from FLdigi that has been received
trans-unit.target: Text: Get text from FLdigi that has been received

trans-unit.source: Text: Send text to FLdigi to be transmitted
trans-unit.target: Text: Send text to FLdigi to be transmitted

trans-unit.source: Transmit: Set RX/TX mode to Transmit, Receive, or Tune.
trans-unit.target: Transmit: Set RX/TX mode to Transmit, Receive, or Tune.

trans-unit.source: API Documentation
trans-unit.target: API 설명서

trans-unit.source: Abort a transmit or tune.
trans-unit.target: Abort a transmit or tune.

trans-unit.source: Allow a phone or tablet to send and receive FLDIGI messages via a custom app. There is an Android version of FLDIGI, but that might not be the best approach for every problem. A more custom application could be created to use only a particular mode and send pre-formatted data, for example, with considerably less work than it would be to fork the FLDIGI mobile application and update it.
trans-unit.target: Allow a phone or tablet to send and receive FLDIGI messages via a custom app. There is an Android version of FLDIGI, but that might not be the best approach for every problem. A more custom application could be created to use only a particular mode and send pre-formatted data, for example, with considerably less work than it would be to fork the FLDIGI mobile application and update it.

trans-unit.source: Application monitoring and launching. It is possible to launch FLdigi from a Python command, and monitor it. Also the program can be killed if it refuses to shut down gracefully.
trans-unit.target: Application monitoring and launching. It is possible to launch FLdigi from a Python command, and monitor it. Also the program can be killed if it refuses to shut down gracefully.

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: 풍모

trans-unit.source: Fldigi is a digital modem application that is widely used in the amateur radio community. It acts as a digital modem, intended to be coupled with a standard SSB or FM transceiver radio.
trans-unit.target: Fldigi is a digital modem application that is widely used in the amateur radio community. It acts as a digital modem, intended to be coupled with a standard SSB or FM transceiver radio.

trans-unit.source: Full implementation of the available XML-RPC client commands]
trans-unit.target: Full implementation of the available XML-RPC client commands]

trans-unit.source: Get FLDIGI version, name, etc.
trans-unit.target: Get FLDIGI version, name, etc.

trans-unit.source: Portable HF setups. Typically, HF digital setups are bulky and require several interconnected pieces of hardware, usually via audio cables. This library, along with some custom hardware, could allow a walkie-talkie sized HF digital radio that’s completely integrated.
trans-unit.target: Portable HF setups. Typically, HF digital setups are bulky and require several interconnected pieces of hardware, usually via audio cables. This library, along with some custom hardware, could allow a walkie-talkie sized HF digital radio that’s completely integrated.

trans-unit.source: Putting a more ‘user-friendly’ GUI on top of FLdigi.
trans-unit.target: Putting a more ‘user-friendly’ GUI on top of FLdigi.

trans-unit.source: Python library to control FLDIGI via XML-RPC
trans-unit.target: Python library to control FLDIGI via XML-RPC

trans-unit.target: Useful FLDIGI documentation

trans-unit.source: Web enabled FLDIGI via HTML5 and some Javascript, that could be accessed from anywhere. Python’s Flask / Django along with Bootstrap, and a few REST calls, for example.
trans-unit.target: Web enabled FLDIGI via HTML5 and some Javascript, that could be accessed from anywhere. Python’s Flask / Django along with Bootstrap, and a few REST calls, for example.

trans-unit.source: pyFldigi
trans-unit.target: pyFldigi

trans-unit.source: pyFldigi is a small Python library that can control the Fldigi application via XML-RPC.
trans-unit.target: pyFldigi is a small Python library that can control the Fldigi application via XML-RPC.
